name: Nazuki the Vaylantz Ninja
effectText: You can target 1 other monster in either Main Monster Zone; move that monster to an adjacent (horizontal) Monster Zone. If this card in the Monster Zone moves to another Monster Zone: You can target 1 "Vaylantz" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it to your Main Monster Zone in its same column. You can only use each effect of "Nazuki the Vaylantz Ninja" once per turn.
pendEffect: If "Vaylantz World - Shinra Bansho" is in a Field Zone or if you control a WATER "Vaylantz" monster: You can Special Summon this card to your Main Monster Zone in its same column. You can only use this effect of "Nazuki the Vaylantz Ninja" once per turn.
